title: Constraint Breeds Generalization: Temporal Dynamics as an Inductive Bias
summary: Conventional deep learning prioritizes unconstrained optimization, yet biological systems operate under strict metabolic constraints. We propose that these physical constraints shape dynamics to function not as limitations, but as a temporal inductive bias that breeds generalization.
